metadata.title: CVE-2022-40468 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Potential leak of left-over heap data if custom error page templatescontaining special non-standard variables are used. Tinyproxy commit84f203f and earlier use uninitialized buffers in process_request()function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40468` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tinyproxy - 1.11.2-1
tinyproxy-bin - 1.11.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tinyproxy package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.2-1').
